eventThumbnail.altText: Photo of students working around a laptop.

children.value: In this online Teacher CPD session, an experienced A level physics teacher from Isaac Physics will show you how to: * create a group * set assignments (simple Physics Skills questions and a custom board of mixed questions) * view the marks for an assignment You will have the chance to do all of the above and ask questions at any time. You'll see how this can reduce your marking workload and help you give better feedback to your students.

####Taking part To take part in this online meeting, you will need: * an account on isaacphysics.org * a Google plus account * a computer/tablet with webcam and microphone (and ideally headphones to reduce feedback) * a quiet place to take part * to register using the button below Register online
